import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Home = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Track Your Expenses
Like a Pro

Take control of your finances with our sleek, modern expense tracker. Monitor spending, set budgets, and achieve your financial goals.

Get Started Sign In
{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose Our App?

Everything you need to manage your money effectively

Expense Tracking

Easily log and categorize your expenses with our intuitive interface

Budget Management

Set budgets for different categories and track your progress

Detailed Reports

Get insights into your spending patterns with comprehensive reports

{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Take Control of Your Finances?

Join thousands of users who are already managing their expenses smarter

Start Tracking Today
); }; export default Home;
